RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 12100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUSPICIOUS MINDS was bumped at the start, prompted the pace two wide for six furlongs, took command at the top of the stretch then drew off at will through the final furlongs to win as much the best. NELL'S BELLS never far back, had a mild late rally in the four path and finished second best. I MATTER trailed for six furlongs then found her best stride late in the six path. HERO'S DAUGHTER away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside to the top of the stretch then weakened. CONDUTTORE stumbled outward bumping the winner at the start, rushed to contention along the inside, was in tight along the rail entering the clubhouse turn then was through after a half. VOODOOISM failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Voodooism
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Hero's Daughter
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Nell's Bells
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally 4path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: I Matter
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, best stride late, 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Conduttore
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled outward, bumped start, in tight 7/8pole, through half

ENTRY.NAME: Suspicious Minds
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed pace, 2 wide, full of run, much the best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE PINK Z battled for the lead along the inside into the turn, edged clear before a half, drifted from the three to the six path entering the stretch and prevailed in a stiff drive under right handed urging. SERENDIPITOUS vied for the lead four wide, steadied entering the stretch and was steadily cutting into the winners advantage late. HONKY TONK MUSIC never far back, had a mild late rally in the middle of the racetrack. COUNTRY RUCKUS dueled for the early lead two wide, had speed into the stretch then weakened. ACCURATE bumped start, chased the pace near the inside into the stretch then was used up. WHISKEY HELPS bumped at the start and was no factor. THANKSDAD bumped at the start and was through after a half. THE RIDER OF SERENDIPITOUS LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE PINK Z FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE AT THE TOP OF THE STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: The Pink Z
ENTRY.COMMENT: contended inside, drifted 3-6path top lane, fully extended,

ENTRY.NAME: Thanksdad
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Accurate
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased inside, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Helps
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Country Ruckus
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 2 wide early, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Serendipitous
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 4 wide, steadied top lane, gaining, jockey claimed foul,

ENTRY.NAME: Honky Tonk Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, mild rally late mid track

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 22. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAY HEY KID unhurried for five and one half furlongs, closed ground determinedly six wide under right handed urging through the stretch and was along in time. LOOKS GOOD N A TUX close up from the start, rallied three wide into the stretch, gained a narrow lead then couldn't handle the winner. GEH SCHNELL waited behind the leader along the rail, got through at the top of the stretch, loomed boldly then was outfinished despite a game effort. GOTSOMEMOJO slow early, found his best stride late four wide. ADANO with the second flight, went evenly five wide through the stretch. KING ANDRES prompted the pace two wide for four and one half furlongs, made the lead, set the pace into the stretch then weakened. GET HAMMERED pressed the pace three wide for a half, matched strides through the far turn, remained a sharp threat into the stretch then gave way late. THIRSTY ACTOR away alertly, set the pace along the inside for four and one half furlongs then was used up. A I INITIATIVE was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Adano
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, evenly, 5 wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: King Andres
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Say Hey Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, closed willingly, 6 wide, right handed urging, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Thirsty Actor
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 7/16pole, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Gotsomemojo
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, best stride late 4wide

ENTRY.NAME: Looks Good N a Tux
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, rallied 3 wide, led late, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: A I Initiative
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Geh Schnell
ENTRY.COMMENT: waited rail, got through top lane, outfinished gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Get Hammered
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, battled 2nd turn, gave way late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Starter Allowance Purse 19000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN THE LAST 5 STARTS. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 22 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4 ,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS OVER THERE was bumped at the start, pressed the pace three wide into the stretch, was struck with a right handed whip twice in mid stretch, surged late under a strong hand ride and was along in time. OUT ATTHE SPEEDWAY never far back, rallied along the rail to make the lead near mid stretch then couldn't handle the winner. ORBIT MARS away alertly, set a pressured pace off the rail in the three path into the stretch then was outfinished. LILAC LACE stalked the pace four wide and went evenly. PRINCESS HALIME pressed the pace two wide into the stretch and faded late. GRAN MAMIBELLA bumped the winner at the start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Orbit Mars
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace off rail, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Halime
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Mamibella
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Over There
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed pace, 3 wide, surged late, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Lilac Lace
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4 wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Out Atthe Speedway
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, quick move rail, led late, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: J. P. RACE never far back, advanced steadily three wide, made the lead late and drew off under mild right handed urging. WARHORSE WEST pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, made the lead then was no match for the winner. OUTSLEWTHEM broke in front, set a pressured pace into the stretch then was outfinished along the inside. TIMESATAPPIN offered a mild bid outside into the stretch then leveled off. LONE LEADER was bumped at the start, pressed the early pace along the inside then faded. AURA OF GOLD also bumped at the start, failed to menace. ONE MORE RING was no threat. VOORHEES had brief speed. NAPA DUDE settled mid pack and was through after a half. OLA BRO bore in at the start bumping rivals then trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Voorhees
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC Hertrich III Frederick and Fielding John D
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Lone Leader
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed early inside, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Aura of Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Ola Bro
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: J. P. Race
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, steady advance, 3 wide, late lead, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: One More Ring
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Warhorse West
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led late 2 wide, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Outslewthem
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Timesatappin
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Napa Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 21500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).). ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROSCO P. COLTRANE allowed to settle, closed rapidly through the stretch four wide and got up in the final strides. SHOW SLIDING HOME vied for the lead into the stretch, rallied three wide to make the lead late then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. DOUGS MORNING PICK unhurried early, found his best stride late between horses four wide. OHIO MUNNY pressed the pace two wide into the turn, made the lead, drifted in when struck with a right handed whip bumping OHIO PLAYER in upper stretch, was put to left handed pressure, drifted out from the rail to the four path late and was outfinished. OHIO PLAYER set the pace along the rail into the turn, gave up the advantage, was bumped then squeezed at the top of the stretch, shifted out to the three path, came on again, had to alter course back inside OHIO MUNNY when that one drifted out late then finished with good courage. HANSENATION failed to menace. PRIVATE DRIVE had good early speed four wide then faded. BLACKTIEANDTUX was outrun. OHIO CAUSE was through early. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND THE RIDER OF OHIO PLAYER LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF OHIO MUNNY FOR INTERFERENCE IN UPPER STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED OHIO MUNNY AND PLACED HIM FIFTH.

ENTRY.NAME: Show Sliding Home
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, rallied 3 wide, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Blacktieandtux
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Player
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside pace, bumped top lane, checked, jockey claimed foul,

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Cause
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Trusso Tony
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Ohio Munny
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, assumed command turn, drifted in, bumped 3/16p

ENTRY.NAME: Rosco P. Coltrane
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed fast, 4 wide, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Hansenation
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Dougs Morning Pick
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, best stride late, between horses, 4wide

ENTRY.NAME: Private Drive
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 4 wide, faded,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 99. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 27500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR ENTERED TO BE CLAIMED FOR $25,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Sin ce February 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WE ALL SEE IT stalked the early pace along the inside, rallied three then two wide to make the lead at the top of the stretch, set the balance of the pace and drew off under right handed urging. DISCLOSURE trailed early, closed willingly in the six path through the stretch and finished well clear for second. CREDIT RIVER set the pace through the clubhouse turn, kept pressure along the inside into the stretch, drifted to the four path then faded. SO DIALED IN rushed to the lead two wide after a quarter mile, set the pace two wide then along the inside to the top of the stretch then weakened. DYRDEK was no threat. OUTLIER had speed four wide into the far turn the gave way in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: We All See It
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked early, moved up 3-2wide, took over top lane, drew off,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Wayne Lyster, Gray Lyster & Bryan Lyster

ENTRY.NAME: Disclosure
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, closed willingly 6path, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Outlier
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 4 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Credit River
ENTRY.COMMENT: led, pressed, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: So Dialed In
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, 2 wide, set pace 1/4 pole, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Dyrdek
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 93. Starter Allowance Purse 17000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN THE LAST 5 STARTS. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 22 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Co nsidered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHACO SPIRIT unhurried into the stretch, closed with a rush five wide under right handed urging and got up in the final strides. D'MONEY HONEY trailed early, closed fast four wide through the stretch to make the lead forty yards from the wire and just missed hanging on. AUGER never far back, rallied three wide into the stretch, made the lead then was outfinished. MONTAUK COVE prompted the pace three wide while hung in the seven path down the backstretch, kept pressure until deep stretch two wide then was outfinished. YOU ARE AWESOME battled for the lead two wide while hung out in the six path down the backstretch, dropped inward entering the turn, matched strides until deep stretch then weakened. GOTTAGETITBACK was no factor. SON OF DARKNESS contested the lead inside rivals while well off the rail in the five path down the backstretch, dropped to the rail entering the turn, had speed into the stretch then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Son of Darkness
ENTRY.OWNER: Sparling Richard and Colony Pamela C
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 5path, inside turn, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: You Are Awesome
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide, hung 6path, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Montauk Cove
ENTRY.COMMENT: hung 7path, pressed 3-2wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Gottagetitback
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Auger
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied 3 wide, led late, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Chaco Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, closed with a rush, 5 wide, up in final strides,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Helen Y. Painter & Shirley I. Gay

ENTRY.NAME: D'money Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed fast, 4 wide, led late, caught
